participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Emily enjoys sharing her love for animals and food with others.
participant_1.background: i've one brother. i live in alabama. i love dogs. i've three sisters. i like tacos.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, James is dedicated to animal welfare and believes in giving back to the community.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
